name: Jumping Cat Flash v.0.0.5
description:
Hi! My name is Luciano from Argentina

This is my first Prototype of a Platform Game developed on Pixi.JS

In this versión there is No End and No Damage. Just to try it and show how it goes.

Move with Arrows.

Assets and Sprites from free downloads on this page. (I owe the credits, sorry!)

Thanks and Enjoy it
